rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTS1201, BTW1201} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit examines business entities law at an advanced level, with emphasis on the law of partnership, company law, the law of close corporations and the law of business trusts. An examination will also be made of the relevant legal aspects relating to corporate governance with specific emphasis on the role and duties of directors. The law pertaining to auditors and their role in a business entity will be examined as will the law relating to financial reporting and the keeping of financial records by business entities.
